mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user(user_email, user_pw, user_name, user_phone) VALUE(#{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone});
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, user_email, user_pw, user_name, user_phone, user_role FROM tb_user WHERE user_id = #{username};
